Properties.string: DONT YOU WISH THIS WAS A SKUNK GUN?!?

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
check=true
debris=game:GetService("Debris") cooldown=.2
function findsquirrel() for _,v in pairs(game.Workspace:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="Honey Badger" then local creatortag=v:FindFirstChild("creator") if creatortag and creatortag.Value==game.Players.LocalPlayer then sp.Handle.Transparency=1 return v end end end end
function onEquipped(mouse) equipped=true local plr=game.Players.LocalPlayer if mouse~=nil and plr~=nil then findsquirrel() mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() local chr=sp.Parent if chr and check then local t=chr:FindFirstChild("Torso") local h=chr:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if t and h and h.Health>0 then check=false mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" local squirrel=findsquirrel() if squirrel==nil then local m=Instance.new("Model") m.Name="Honey Badger" local p=sp.Handle:clone() p.Friction=.2 p.Name="Torso" p.Transparency=0 p.CanCollide=true p.CFrame=CFrame.new() local rd=Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*15,(math.random()-.5)*5,(math.random()-.5)*15) p.Position=sp.Handle.Position+rd p.Velocity=rd p.Mesh.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=123154403" p.Parent=m local he=Instance.new("Part") he.Name="Head" he.formFactor="Custom" he.Transparency=1 he.Size=Vector3.new(0,0,0) he.Parent=m local w=Instance.new("Weld") w.Name="Neck" w.Part0=p w.Part1=he w.Parent=p local h=Instance.new("Humanoid") h.MaxHealth=100 h.Health=100 h.WalkSpeed=18 h.Parent=m
local leftarm=Instance.new("Part") leftarm.Name="Left Arm" leftarm.CanCollide=false leftarm.Locked=true leftarm.formFactor="Custom" leftarm.TopSurface="Smooth" leftarm.BottomSurface="Smooth" leftarm.Size=Vector3.new(.6,1.1,.6) local law=Instance.new("Motor") law.Name="LeftShoulder" law.MaxVelocity=.2 law.Part0=p law.Part1=leftarm law.C0=CFrame.new(-.3,0,-.3)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*.5,0) law.C1=CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*.5,0)*CFrame.new(0,.1,0) law.Parent=p local mesh=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") mesh.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=123147944"--122324353" mesh.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=123147436" mesh.Parent=leftarm leftarm.Parent=m
local rightarm=Instance.new("Part") rightarm.Name="Right Arm" rightarm.CanCollide=false rightarm.Locked=true rightarm.formFactor="Custom" rightarm.TopSurface="Smooth" rightarm.BottomSurface="Smooth" rightarm.Size=Vector3.new(.6,1.1,.6) local raw=Instance.new("Motor") raw.Name="RightShoulder" raw.MaxVelocity=.2 raw.Part0=p raw.Part1=rightarm raw.C0=CFrame.new(.3,0,-.3)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*.5,0) raw.C1=CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*.5,0)*CFrame.new(0,.1,0) raw.Parent=p local mesh=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") mesh.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=123147920" mesh.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=123147436" mesh.Parent=rightarm rightarm.Parent=m
local leftleg=Instance.new("Part") leftleg.Name="Left Leg2" leftleg.CanCollide=false leftleg.Locked=true leftleg.formFactor="Custom" leftleg.TopSurface="Smooth" leftleg.BottomSurface="Smooth" leftleg.Size=Vector3.new(.6,1.6,.9) local llw=Instance.new("Motor") llw.Name="LeftHip" llw.MaxVelocity=.2 llw.Part0=p llw.Part1=leftleg llw.C0=CFrame.new(-.3,0,.5)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*.5,0) llw.C1=CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*.5,0)*CFrame.new(0,-.25,0) llw.Parent=p local mesh=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") mesh.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=123148102" mesh.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=123147436" mesh.Parent=leftleg leftleg.Parent=m
local rightleg=Instance.new("Part") rightleg.Name="Right Leg2" rightleg.CanCollide=false rightleg.Locked=true rightleg.formFactor="Custom" rightleg.TopSurface="Smooth" rightleg.BottomSurface="Smooth" rightleg.Size=Vector3.new(.6,1.6,.9) local rlw=Instance.new("Motor") rlw.Name="RightHip" rlw.MaxVelocity=.2 rlw.Part0=p rlw.Part1=rightleg rlw.C0=CFrame.new(.3,0,.5)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*.5,0) rlw.C1=CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*.5,0)*CFrame.new(0,-.25,0) rlw.Parent=p local mesh=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") mesh.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=123154483" mesh.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=123147436" mesh.Parent=rightleg rightleg.Parent=m
local orders=Instance.new("StringValue") orders.Name="Orders" orders.Value="Follow" orders.Parent=m local target=Instance.new("ObjectValue") target.Name="Target" target.Parent=m local targetpos=Instance.new("Vector3Value") targetpos.Name="TargetPos" targetpos.Parent=m local ct=Instance.new("ObjectValue") ct.Value=game.Players.LocalPlayer ct.Name="creator" ct.Parent=m local s=script.Script:clone() s.Parent=m s.Disabled=false debris:AddItem(m,5*60) m.Parent=game.Workspace p.Position=sp.Handle.Position+rd sp.Handle.Transparency=1
elseif mouse.Target~=nil then local th=mouse.Target.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") or mouse.Target.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if th and th.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") then squirrel.Target.Value=th.Parent squirrel.Orders.Value="Attack" else squirrel.Target.Value=mouse.Target squirrel.TargetPos.Value=mouse.Hit.p squirrel.Orders.Value="MoveTo" end end wait(cooldown) mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" check=true end end end) end end
function onUnequipped() equipped=false sp.Handle.Transparency=0 end
sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) sp.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
damage=2
alive=true check=true nextjump=0 nextgrowl=0 lastmove=0 cycle=0 amplitude=.2 frequency=2
meshes={122293937} standmesh=122293937 local link="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
head=sp:WaitForChild("Head") hum=sp:WaitForChild("Humanoid") torso=sp:WaitForChild("Torso") mesh=torso:WaitForChild("Mesh") ct=sp:WaitForChild("creator") orders=sp:WaitForChild("Orders") targettag=sp:WaitForChild("Target") targetpostag=sp:WaitForChild("TargetPos") local law=torso:WaitForChild("LeftShoulder") local raw=torso:WaitForChild("RightShoulder") local llw=torso:WaitForChild("LeftHip") local rlw=torso:WaitForChild("RightHip") torso:WaitForChild('Smoke').Enabled=true
torso.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent.Name~=sp.Name and alive and check then local h=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h~=nil then local plr=game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent) if plr then if plr==ct.Value then return end end check=false if not hit:FindFirstChild('Smoke') then local tsmoke = torso:WaitForChild('Smoke'):Clone() tsmoke.Parent = hit end Spawn(function() for i=0,10,1 do if h.Health>0 then h:TakeDamage(damage) end wait(1) end end) playgrowl() wait(1) check=true end end end)
hum.Changed:connect(function(prop) if hum then if hum.Health<=0 then alive=false if torso then if mesh then mesh.VertexColor=Vector3.new(1,.1,.1) end hum:remove() if head then head:remove() end wait(5) end sp:remove() end else alive=false sp:remove() end end)
function playgrowl() if torso then local sound=torso:FindFirstChild("GrowlSound1")--..tostring(math.random(1,1))) if sound then sound.Pitch=.9+math.random()*.3 sound:Play() end end end
while alive do t1,t2=wait(.05) if orders.Value=="Follow" then if ct.Value then local chr=ct.Value.Character local tt=chr:FindFirstChild("Torso") if tt then hum.WalkSpeed=15 hum:MoveTo((tt.CFrame*CFrame.new(-3,0,-5)).p,tt) end end elseif orders.Value=="MoveTo" then hum.WalkSpeed=18 hum:MoveTo(targetpostag.Value,targettag.Value) lastmove=t2 orders.Value="Nothing" elseif orders.Value=="Attack" then if targettag.Value then local tt=targettag.Value:FindFirstChild("Torso") local th=targettag.Value:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if tt then --and th and th.Health>0 then --this is too awesome local offset=Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*5,(math.random()-.5)*5,(math.random()-.5)*5) hum.WalkSpeed=22 hum:MoveTo(tt.Position+offset,tt) else orders.Value="Follow" end end elseif orders.Value=="Nothing" then if t2-lastmove>=20 then orders.Value="Follow" end end if t2>nextjump then nextjump=t2+math.random(5,10) hum.Jump=true end if t2>nextgrowl then nextgrowl=t2+math.random(5,10) playgrowl() end --[[if torso.Velocity.magnitude>2 then cycle=cycle+1 mesh.MeshId=link..tostring(meshes[(cycle%#meshes)+1]) else mesh.MeshId=link..tostring(standmesh) end]] if torso.Velocity.magnitude>2 then amplitude=1 frequency=hum.WalkSpeed*.7 else amplitude=.2 frequency=2 end
--RightShoulder.MaxVelocity=.5 --LeftShoulder.MaxVelocity=.5 climbFudge=math.pi desiredAngle=amplitude*math.sin(t2*frequency) desiredAngle2=amplitude*math.sin((t2*frequency)+.5)
law.DesiredAngle=desiredAngle raw.DesiredAngle=desiredAngle2 llw.DesiredAngle=-desiredAngle2 rlw.DesiredAngle=-desiredAngle end
